      This method displays possible moves of a given piece on the board.
      Parameters:

      y - coordinate y of a piece

      Displays the promotion window to change a piece.
      Returns:

    • dropFile

      private void dropFile(javafx.scene.input.DragEvent event)
      Method to handle drop event. It is used in the configuration window so user can just drag and drop a file with saved game.

      event -
